responses: I am a chatbot designed to answer questions about Vanshaj Raghuvanshi. I can provide details about his education, skills, projects, experience, and socials.

Vanshaj Raghuvanshi is a Computer Science and Engineering student at Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology. He specializes in AI, ML, and software development. Ask me more to learn about his work!
Vanshaj is pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology. His current CGPA is 9.04/10.
Vanshaj has expertise in Python, Java, JavaScript, C/C++, ML/DL, OpenCV, SQL/NoSQL Databses, Vector Stores, AWS, and focusing on Generative AI.

patterns: What projects has Vanshaj worked on?
responses:
Vanshaj has worked on multiple projects across AI, ML, NLP, and web development. Here are some notable ones:

- **Object Detection**: A Python GUI application that identifies objects from the COCO dataset in both live feed and images. [Live Demo](https://objects-vanshajr.streamlit.app) | [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/ObjectDetection)
- **Zenith**: A website for a 3-day tech event involving a cryptic hunt. [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/ZenithCryptic)
- **Nexus Q&A**: A chatbot using LLMs and RAG to answer questions about Vanshaj. [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/Nexus-QA)
- **Facial Recognition**: A Python application for training and detecting faces in datasets, supporting live feed and images. [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/FacialRecognition)
- **Branchify**: A published Python package that creates a folder structure with customizable parameters. [PyPi](https://pypi.org/project/branchify/) | [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/Branchify)
- **ChatPDF**: A Streamlit app to upload PDFs and query their content. [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/ZenithCryptic)
- **Linear Equations Solver**: An Android app to solve systems of linear equations up to 20 variables. [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/LinearEquationSolver)
- **AutoQuote**: A VS Code extension for automatic insertion of quotes in code. [VS Code Marketplace](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=VanshajRaghuvanshi.auto-quote) | [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/AutoQuote)
- **Healix**: A Python GUI app for managing patient/staff records and appointments with a PostgreSQL backend. [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/Healix)
- **Cypher the ChatBot**: A rule-based chatbot using NLP and neural networks. [Live Demo](https://cypher-chat.streamlit.app) | [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/ChatBot)
- **Physics Experiments Solver**: A GUI app to solve and visualize physics experiments from Vanshaj’s first year. [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/Physics-Experiment-Result-Visualiser)
- **Artificial Neural Network Implementation**: Predicts customer retention using an ANN model. [Live Demo](https://ann-prac-vanshajr.streamlit.app) | [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/ANN-Implementation)
- **Pneumonia Detection**: A CNN-based model that predicts pneumonia in X-ray images, comparing results with PCA, SVM, and Logistic Regression. [Live Demo](https://pneumonia-vanshajr.streamlit.app) | [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/Pneumonia_Detection)
- **Movie Review Classification**: A Streamlit app using an RNN model to classify movie reviews. [Live Demo](https://review-classify.streamlit.app) | [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/RNN-Review-Classification)
- **Handwritten Digit Recognition**: Uses a trained LightGBM model to recognize handwritten digits. [Live Demo](https://vanshajr-digit-recognition-lightgbm-app-99enas.streamlit.app) | [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/Digit-Recognition-LightGBM)
- **Next Word Prediction**: An LSTM-based model trained on Shakespeare’s Hamlet to predict the next word in a sentence. [Live Demo](https://vanshajr-lstm-next-word-app-yrrb4v.streamlit.app) | [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/LSTM-Next-Word)
- **ReVig and Neural Network Ciphers**: Encrypts and decrypts text using a modified Vigenère cipher and a custom neural network cipher. [Live Demo](https://cipher-vanshajr.streamlit.app/) | [GitHub](https://github.com/VanshajR/Ciphers)

For more, check out Vanshaj's GitHub: [github.com/VanshajR](https://github.com/VanshajR).

patterns: Does Vanshaj have any work experience?
Tell me about Vanshaj's work experience
responses: Vanshaj has interned at Meril, a medical company; Techplement, an IT services company, and CodeClause, contributing to AI and ML development. He has also worked with the Kshitiksha Foundation and held technical leadership roles at TIET.
At Thapar, he is currently the Technical Lead at the Thapar Institue Counselling Cell, and a mental health ambassador. He has also been the technical head at Backslash Computing Society.
